article.author: Atlas Ocean Voyages
article.title: Launching You into Your Much-Deserved New Adventures
article.teaser: Look forward to boundless explorations with deep immersions and simple elegance in your future travels.
article.lead: Look forward to boundless explorations with deep immersions and simple elegance in your future travels.
article.body:
Atlas Ocean Voyages provides the kind of vacation experiences you deserve to look forward to when making your summer plans and beyond. With a purpose-built, small vessel taking you to once-in-a-lifetime moments in outstanding destinations, we’re giving you the opportunity to travel in way you never have before.


Go on Indulgent Travels with Atlas Ocean Voyages

Take a look at the luxe-adventure experience awaiting you aboard the brand-new World Navigator, steeped in simple elegance and invigorating moments.



The Luxe-Adventure Experience

Bask in the simple elegance of World Navigator as you experience invigorating moments with cultural immersions and stimulating challenges. You deserve to revel in luxe-adventure travel, our holistic approach to expedition-style cruising, as you visit bucket-list destinations.


New Places You’ll Go

We’re launching our inaugural season in summer 2021 with new luxe-adventure voyages to the Greek Isles and Egypt. Our 7- to 12-night journeys are bringing you to age-old landmarks, cultural immersions, modern wonders and more in renowned destinations and remote ports. We’re also excited to introduce you to our newest 2022 luxe-adventure expeditions with 24 new sailings in 5 new world regions: the Arctic, Baltic, British Isles, Iceland and Greenland and Norwegian Fjords. And you’ll visit these bucket-list destinations aboard the brand-new World Navigator.


Your World On Board

Our premier, small expedition-style ship, World Navigator, allows for more intimate experiences and fewer crowds with fewer than 200 guests. Bringing you closer to your destinations and into remote ports, her small size gives you the opportunity for more personal moments on your all-inclusive adventures.


All Inclusive All The Way

Luxe-adventure journeys always include everything you expect and more. Including roundtrip commercial airfare to all destinations, complimentary land excursions in every port and exclusively offering only Balcony and Suite accommodations, and everything in between, every detail is taken into consideration as you plan your much-deserved vacation.
article.hero_caption: Launching You into Your Much-Deserved New Adventures
article.article_caption: Launching You into Your Much-Deserved New Adventures

article.author: Celebrity Cruises<sup>®</sup>
article.title: Someday IS HERE
article.teaser: Let’s travel the world together again.
article.lead: Let’s travel the world together again.
article.body:
The moment we’ve been waiting for has finally arrived! Beginning this summer, you’ll again experience breathtaking journeys to the Caribbean islands departing from the United States. Leading the way as the very first ship to sail from the U.S. once again is our award-winning ship, Celebrity Edge®. And, at the helm is the very first American female captain, Kate McCue. Along with two more of our award-winning ships, Celebrity Equinox® and Celebrity Summit®, and our newest ship, Celebrity ApexSM, we’re offering more Caribbean getaways than ever before.

Someday is Here: Summer 2021 Cruises Now Sailing

Someday is Here. The moment has arrived when you can finally turn your vacation dreams into your dream vacation with our new sailings from the U.S.

article.author: Viking<sup>®</sup>
article.title: The Viking<sup>®</sup> Difference
article.body:
Embark on a Journey of Discovery

Sailing through the heart of cities and landscapes with Viking River Cruises, you’ll see things differently. You’ll get closer to iconic landmarks, to local life, to culture treasures. It’s a feeling that only a river can give you, that only Viking can give you. These are journeys that will forever change your perspective on the world and perhaps even yourself. Viking River Cruises. Exploring the World in Comfort.


At Viking, we believe in offering you extraordinarily well-designed cruises that bring you closer to the cultures of the world. You sail into the heart of your destination—where new discoveries are just a short walk from your ship. We have fine-tuned the art of exploring the world in comfort.

From our Viking Longships® on Europe’s rivers to our elegant sister ships on the world’s great oceans and seas, our award-winning vessels have been thoughtfully engineered by nautical architects to bring the outside in. Graceful staterooms and suites were designed with your comfort and serenity in mind, and light-filled public spaces inspire and refresh you throughout your journey.

The Thinking Person’s Cruise® Travel should be more than just a trip—it should be a doorway to cultural insight and personal enrichment. That is why our itineraries are designed to help you explore and engage with your destination through its food, culture, countryside and customs. Included shore excursions and carefully curated optional tours provide the perfect overview of must-see cultural and historic highlights. But The Viking Way® of exploration goes beyond the expected and iconic, offering Local Life, Working World and optional Privileged Access® experiences. While on board, our enrichment programs bring local culture and history to life, complementing your time ashore.

Our destination-focused approach to river and ocean cruising has earned us a place in the industry as the world’s leading small ship cruise line. In 2020, Viking was once again honored in Condé Nast Traveler’s annual Readers’ Choice Awards—marking 15 years of recognition. And for every consecutive year since we launched our ocean cruises, Viking has been named the #1 Ocean Cruise Line* by Travel + Leisure readers in the World’s Best Awards. We also received 11 first place honors in Cruise Critic’s 9th annual Cruisers’ Choice Awards, sweeping all major categories, including the newly added Best for River Cruises category.

Sail with Viking and experience a journey of discovery created for curious travelers like you, with true explorer spirits.

*Ship size category: 600–2,199 guests
